category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_daily_file_download_attempts_limit
preference.preference_description: Indicates the maximum number of allowed attempts to download the given file from International Material Data System (IMDS) server. This value is used by the "imds_download_file" utility. The default value is 5.
